translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロ本買ってたら」「ま、周りにジロジロ見られながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I was buying that erotic magazine," "well, I was being stared at by everyone around me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッチな本をレジに出して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I put the naughty book on the register...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あ、ああ……」「すっごくすっごく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A-a-aaah..." "It was incredibly, incredibly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恥ずかしかったんですからねー！」「うわーん、ランスさんの馬鹿ー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: embarrassing!" "Wahhh, Rance, you idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私もうあの本屋行けませんー！」「さて、それより女向けの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't go to that bookstore anymore!" "Anyway, what about erotic novels aimed at women?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロ小説ってどんな感じかな？」「話聞いて下さい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder what they’re like?" "Please listen to my story!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむふむ、男と女が付き合って……うんうん、オナニーして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm hmm, a man and a woman go out together... uh-huh, masturbate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人が付き合って終わった……」「……なんか……ぬるいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They dated and then it ended..." "...Somehow... that’s bland."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガキ向けのエロ本って奴か？18禁でもない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it some kind of kiddie erotic book? It’s not even rated 18+.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もっとドロドロぐちょぐちょに濡れ場バリバリの奴はないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn’t there one that’s more messy and dripping with intense sex scenes?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなの買えませんよー！」（まあいい、徐々に過激にしていくか。うむ、俺様は待てる男なのだ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can’t buy that kind of thing!" (Well, fine, I’ll gradually make it more intense. Yes, I am a man who can wait.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、パンパン。というわけで司書のビスケッタさん、これを本棚に入れといてくれたまえ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, done! So, librarian Biscetta, please put this on the bookshelf."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かしこまりました」「…………」「……最初から本のチョイスもビスケッタさんに任せれば良かったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Understood." "..." "...I should have just left the book selection to Biscetta from the start."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もっと早く気づいて下さい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please realize that sooner!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、図書室――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Library—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の図書館で、ハウゼルが今日も一人、静かに本を読んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the library of Rance Castle, Hauzel was quietly reading a book alone again today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウッゼッルッ様ーーー」「きゃああああああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hauuuzel-samaaa!" "Kyaaaaaaa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その静寂をブチ壊すように突如現れた火炎書士がハウゼルに抱きついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Breaking the silence, a flaming librarian suddenly appeared and hugged Hauzel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、驚いた……火炎……駄目じゃない、突然抱きついては……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you surprised me... Kaen... You shouldn’t suddenly hug me like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、す、すみません……久しぶりにハウゼル様にお会いできて嬉しくて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, s-sorry... I’m just so happy to see Hauzel-sama after such a long time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「火炎」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kaen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し強めの語気での注意に、火炎書士がびくりと肩をふるわせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the slightly firmer tone of admonishment, the flaming librarian visibly trembled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、うっ……はい……すみません……しょぼん……」「でも、そうね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ugh... yes... I’m sorry... *dejected*" "But, well..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
